alert.note: Alert for Augusta; Central Virginia Blue Ridge; Northern Virginia Blue Ridge; Page; Rockingham (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 06 at 2:07PM EST until January 06 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation. Total snow and sleet accumulations of up to 2 inches and ice accumulations of one tenth to one third of an inch. The highest ice accumulations will be on the ridges. * WHERE...Augusta, Rockingham and Page Counties, and Northern Virginia Blue Ridge and Central Virginia Blue Ridge. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing rain will gradually change over to rain this afternoon, especially for the lower elevations.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

area.areaDesc: Augusta; Central Virginia Blue Ridge; Northern Virginia Blue Ridge; Page; Rockingham
